items.sentence: How many animals do you think are in this zoo?
Aren\'t you going to attend the meeting today?
Things don\'t always turn out the way we plan.
Tom described the person he saw to the police.
Tom said it wouldn\'t be difficult to do that.
Tom saw Mary take John\'s umbrella by mistake.
Tom says he doesn\'t have the money right now.
Tickets are available from Lions Club members.
Tom Jackson was predeceased by his wife, Mary.
Do you know how Tom got that scar on his chin?
What do you expect to find in Tom\'s basement?
What do you know about Tom that I don\'t know?
I wonder why we didn\'t get a newspaper today.
Are you looking for something to do in Boston?
You\'re supposed to be home with your parents.
You\'re the only person that can persuade Tom.
I\'ll try to convince Tom not to work so hard.
I\'m interested in doing that, but Tom isn\'t.
Tom and Mary grew up in the same neighborhood.
Tom and Mary haven\'t done their homework yet.
